(amụrụ n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe na onye na-ese foto. N'afọ 2019 ha natara Emerging Visual Arts Grant site na Rema Hort Mann Foundation.
N'afọ 2017, Brown gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BFA na Mahadum New York na Tisch School of Arts
Ha gakwara Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture n'afọ 2017.

Ọrụ Brown sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Deana Lawson, Carrie Mae Weems, na Lorna Simpson. Ọrụ ha malitere site n'ilekwasị anya na onyinyo onwe onye iji nyochaa mgbagwoju anya nke okike na njirimara. Ọrụ Brown na-agwa ndị isi ojii okwu site na iji mmekọrịta chiri anya nke ihe osise dị ka ụzọ isi jụọ echiche ndị e chepụtara echepụta banyere ihe ọjọọ na oji.

Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na ndị na-emepụta ejiji nyere Brown ọrụ, gụnyere New York Magazine, Gayletter Magazine, The New Yorker, Vice, Teen Vogue, Dazed, W Magazine, na Telfar Clemens. W Magazine, Vice, na The Fader gosipụtara ọrụ ha.
N'afọ 2017, Brown so jịkọ Devin N
Morris duzie "Zine and Self-Published Photo Book Fair" nke asaa kwa afọ, nke akpọrọ Rock Paper Scissors and a Three-Armed Shovel.
